itunes:title: 52: How to Overcome Fear. How to Combat Burnout.  Violating Values to Achieve Goals.  How to Follow Through w/ Ideas.
title: 52: How to Overcome Fear. How to Combat Burnout.  Violating Values to Achieve Goals.  How to Follow Through w/ Ideas.

itunes:subtitle: 0:00:00 - Opening - 0:04:35 - Finding time to train in BJJ while deployed. - 0:12:07 - Choosing your battles at work. - 0:24:28 - Recommendations for careers in Leadership - 0:31:33 - How to combat burnout. -
itunes:summary:
0:00:00 - Opening 0:04:35 - Finding time to train in BJJ while deployed. 0:12:07 - Choosing your battles at work. 0:24:28 - Recommendations for careers in Leadership 0:31:33 - How to combat burnout. 0:50:50 - Dealing with labeling at work as former Special Forces 0:55:09 - Is it ever Okay to violate core values to achieve a goal? 1:07:41 - How to Recalibrate the Fight or Flight response. 1:18:46 - How to follow through with ideas. 1:28:28 - When to start a child in Jiu Jitsu. 1:40:18 - How to overcome fear and be brave. 1:43:24 - Support Stuff.  Cool internet, Onnit, Jocko Store, Jocko Tea stuff. 2:05:57 - Closing
